Reference:
Bentley MJ, Fogwill CJ, Kubik PW, Sugden DE, 2006. Geomorphological evidence and cosmogenic 10Be/26Al exposure ages for the last glacial maximum and deglaciation of the Antarctic Peninsula ice sheet. Geological Society of America Bulletin 118, 1149-1159.

Data comments:
Sample density assumed to be 2.65 g/cm3.
Sampling year assumed to be 2004.
Group ID based on sample location and geomorphology.

expage.github.io
